pr_title: Fix NPE in OCFileListFragment when OCFile is null

timeline.message:
Fix NPE in OCFileListFragment when OCFile is null

1. Fixed NPE
2. Audited all use of nullable field in all called APIs
3. Updated called APIs nullability documentation

Fixes #6282

Signed-off-by: Chris Narkiewicz <hello@ezaquarii.com>

Fix NPE in OCFileListFragment when OCFile is null

1. Fixed NPE
2. Audited all use of nullable field in all called APIs
3. Updated called APIs nullability documentation

Fixes #6282

Signed-off-by: Chris Narkiewicz <hello@ezaquarii.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Is this really true?
Root folder should also just be a OCFile? 🤔
timeline.author: tobiasKaminsky
timeline.diffHunk:

-     * @param folder Folder to check.
+     * @param folder Folder to check or null for root folder
